title: Build Schema Validator with Auto-Repair
description: Develop scripts/schema-validator.py to validate all task JSON files against schema and auto-repair safe issues (missing fields, date formats, broken references). Must handle validation of breakdown structures and subtask references.
notes: Functions: validate_all_tasks(), fix_missing_fields(), fix_date_formats(), fix_broken_references(), generate_health_report(). Safe repairs only - flag ambiguous issues for LLM review. Special handling for parent-subtask relationships.
decision_rationale: Schema validation prevents malformed JSON from breaking the system. Auto-repair reduces manual intervention for common issues.
